About Me

Let me tell you a few things

BIO

Hi there, I am a professional full-stack web, android developer and UI/UX designer. Love to create applications based on real world problems and websites to grow businesses. I have a working experience of 2 years in industry. Worked as Web Development Master and SQA Hero at Buzz Interactive. Also, worked as a Python Player and Machine Learning Expert at Crymzee Nerworks. Software Champion in day time and Freelancer (Customer Relation Warrior) at night.

WebShop ( Tech & Tools )

Full Stack Developer

MERN Stack - MongoDB, Express, ReactJs, NodeJs

PRP - Postgresql, Ruby On Rails, Puma

LAMP Stack - Linux, Apache, MySQL, PHP

Front End Developer
